name: sync::rcu::monitor::RcuMonitor::after_grace_period

sync::spin::SpinLock::<T>::disable_irq.doc: Converts the guard behavior from disabling preemption to disabling IRQs.

alloc::boxed::Box::<T>::new.doc:
Allocates memory on the heap and then places `x` into it.

 This doesn't actually allocate if `T` is zero-sized.

 # Examples

 ```
 let five = Box::new(5);
 ```
